backend/main.mo: Main canister defining storage maps, pond/post/ribbit types, activity tracking, likes, tag stats, user identity linkage, and access control setup.
backend/migration.mo: Stub migration module providing run() to transform old actor state to new format.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend components and pages for reference or documentation.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide detailing prerequisites, build steps, and commands for deploying the app to the Internet Computer.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file providing root container and loading the main frontend entry script.
frontend/scripts/combined-update.sh: Bash script automating backend binding generation, frontend build, and canister deployment with error handling.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React entry configuring routes, global layout, theming, and Froggy Phrase initialization.
frontend/src/components/BookmarkButton.t: Bookmark toggle button component handling bookmark state and icon display.
frontend/src/components/CommentItem.tsx: Comment display component showing avatar, metadata, content, and optional like/reply actions.
frontend/src/components/EmojiReactions.t: Emoji reaction bar supporting multiple emoji types, counts, hover animation, and selection.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with navigation links and attribution message displayed across the site.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header component with navigation, search (desktop and mobile), user avatar loading, and search dropdown/modal behavior.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Defines the main layout with header, footer, outlet content, and a mobile sidebar drawer that closes on route change.
frontend/src/components/LeftSidebar.tsx: Left sidebar showing navigation links and recent activity with active-state detection and pond/lily lookups.
frontend/src/components/LilyCard.tsx: Displays a lily post with avatar, metadata, stats, like/share actions, optional tags, and image preview.
frontend/src/components/LilyImageFrame.t: Renders an image with aspect‑ratio detection, using a blurred backdrop for non‑4:3 images.
frontend/src/components/MobileLeftSideba: Mobile drawer wrapper for the LeftSidebar with scroll‑locking and animated open/close states.
frontend/src/components/PondAboutSidebar: Shows detailed pond info including stats, moderators, visibility, and join/leave controls.
frontend/src/components/PondCardJoinCont: Join button logic for pond cards with mutation handling and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/PondMobileHeader: Mobile header showing pond banner, profile info, and navigation tabs for Feed and About.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Card displaying a post with votes, metadata, content preview, image, tag, and comment/view counts.
frontend/src/components/ProfileRibbitIte: Displays a user's ribbit with avatar, linked post title, timestamp, content, and link to the conversation.
Popover tray providing quick emoji buttons for ribbit reactions.
frontend/src/components/RibbitItem.tsx: Renders a threaded ribbit with avatar, timestamp, likes, and a reply form with nested depth indentation.
frontend/src/components/RibbitMiniBlurAv: Loads an avatar with a blurred placeholder and transitions to the full image once loaded.
frontend/src/components/RightSidebar.tsx: Sidebar showing trending ponds, popular tags, and recent high‑view posts with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/components/search/MobileSea: Implements a full‑screen mobile search modal with trending searches, suggestions, and input handling.
frontend/src/components/search/SearchDro: Renders a dropdown showing trending searches or suggestions based on the current query.
frontend/src/components/TagHubRightSideb: Sidebar listing top, trending, and newest tags using modular tag sections with loading states.
frontend/src/components/UnderlineTabs.ts: Provides styled wrapper components for tab lists and triggers with underline classes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookmarks.ts: Manages bookmarked lily IDs with localStorage persistence and helper functions to modify them.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebounce.ts: Returns a debounced version of a value after a specified delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for Internet Identity login, identity persistence, and auth client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaQuery.ts: Tracks whether a CSS media query matches and updates on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with backend pond, user, and search operations using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme color variables for light and dark modes, base typography, and various utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/formatNumber.ts: Provides a helper to format large numbers into k, M, and B shorthand.
frontend/src/lib/froggyPhraseWordList.ts: Exports frog-related terms and a large general word list for Froggy Phrase generation.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Implements client‑side image validation, resizing, and compression with GIF animation detection.
frontend/src/lib/pondNameValidation.ts: Validates and normalizes pond names as strict alphanumeric strings with error messaging.
frontend/src/lib/pondRank.ts: Sorts ponds by lily count, member count, and name to assign deterministic ranks.
frontend/src/lib/shareLily.ts: Shares a lily URL using Web Share API with clipboard and textarea fallbacks.
frontend/src/lib/tagValidation.ts: Validates and normalizes alphanumeric tags and returns user-friendly errors.
frontend/src/lib/user.ts: Manages usernames, IDs, Froggy Phrase generation/storage, and settings backup in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/viewCountCooldown.ts: Tracks per‑lily cooldown timestamps in localStorage to limit view count increments.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with query client and Internet Identity context, then renders App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with platform description, key features, and community guidelines using static content and UI components.
frontend/src/pages/AllPondsPage.tsx: Displays a list of all ponds with ranking, join controls, and loading states, using pond and membership data from queries.
frontend/src/pages/CreateLilyPage.tsx: Provides a form to create a lily with support for text, images, links, tags, validation, and image compression.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePondPage.tsx: Implements a pond creation form including name validation, description, froggy phrase, and compressed banner/profile image uploads.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePostPage.tsx: Allows creating text, image, or link posts with pond selection, image compression, validation, and submission to backend.
frontend/src/pages/FrogProfilePage.tsx: Renders a user profile page showing avatar, name, post/comment counts, and tabs for posts and comments with loading and not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the main feed of lilies with trending/new sorting, search handling, and sidebars, including loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/LilyPage.tsx: Shows a single lily with comments, likes, views, and ribbit creation, handling view count increment logic and media display.
frontend/src/pages/PondAboutPage.tsx: Renders detailed pond information including moderators, visibility, join/leave actions, and loading/not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/PondPage.tsx: Displays a pond’s feed of lilies with sorting, sidebars, banner header, and loading/not-found handling.
frontend/src/pages/PostPage.tsx: Displays a full post with metadata, image/link content, and threaded comments, and allows creating new comments.
frontend/src/pages/SavedLiliesPage.tsx: Shows locally bookmarked lilies, loading each by ID and allowing removal from saved items.
frontend/src/pages/TagHubPage.tsx: Lists top, trending, and newest tags with stats, switchable via tabs and navigable to tag detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/TagPage.tsx: Shows lilies for a specific tag with sorting, canonical tag redirects, and subcategory listings.
frontend/src/pages/UserSettingsPage.tsx: Provides user settings including username changes, avatar uploads, profile editing, pond management, and admin tools.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme colors, containers, animations, and enabled plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, architectural notes, and multiple feature requests focused on removing AccessControl checks for normal users and auto‑joining pond creators. Also tracks issues with unauthorized errors and describes pending/in‑progress backend updates.
